values.description: A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a yorkshire terrier. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit; speaking is difficult outside of barks and whines, but eating is easier.
A snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a yorkshire terrier. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier. Adaptation has removed some of the difficulty with speaking.

A cute snout graces [PAWN_nameDef]'s face, like that of a yorkshire terrier. [PAWN_possessive] teeth are pointed to suit, making eating easier. Oddly, this doesn't seem to impact [PAWN_possessive] abilty to speak.
Fluffy, soft dog ears flick around at the sides of [PAWN_nameDef]'s head. They are incredibly cute.
A fluffy terrier tail points out from [PAWN_nameDef]'s back. Was that a small wag just then?
